column2: The Industrial Workers of the World

Created in Chicago in 1905 by various leftists figures, the IWW seeks to destroy capitalism and the state and bring about an order where the workers control all things. After centuries of repression, the Event has created an opportunity where any working person can take up the reins and fight for liberation. Workers of the world, unite!
Attempt to find out whether [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is open to the power of the Left. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become a Wobbly.
Has not been asked to join the IWW already

[Root.GetDWDevil]'s favors, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The great and mighty [Root.GetDWDevil] has given us so much, and now it is time for us to offer them a gift in return. [Root.GetDWDevil] craves a soul to serve them in their gulag and we have the perfect kind in mind. Capture and sacrifice a [Root.GetDWSacrifice], [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

[Root.GetDWExpression]
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
